pkgmetadata.longdescription: Construct Consensus Genetic Maps and Estimate Recombination Rates // Construct consensus genetic maps with LPmerge, see Endelman and Plomion (2014) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btu091 and model the relationship between physical distance and genetic distance using thin-plate regression splines, see Wood (2003) doi:10.1111/1467-9868.00374. Perform quality control on input data and visualise intermediate steps.
